name: Create Google Docs from templates for Shopify orders and attach them to a Front message
description: Every time a new Shopify order is created, Make will automatically create a new Google Doc from a Google Docs template, convert it to PDF, and create a zip archive of these files. Then it will send a Front message with the archive attached in it. This example uses the template in [this link](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1WCtGEkRV-Vt7Jkf1xrnUA10KFj4RW1sMI50bYX-eKvM/edit?usp=sharing).
